p.s: The novel Gun Love published by Jennifer Clement in 2019 deals with the social problems of the 14 year old Pearl and her runaway mother who lived in a car.
After PearlsPearl's mother Margot has been shot, the CPSChild Protective Services, went to their car to take Pearl into foster care.
Now she lives in an old mansman's house with two other childrenschildren which parents were also shot.
They are called Leo and Helen.
Helen, an eight year old girl, lives her whole life with foster parents.
She has not many information about her parents and her past, therfore she tells everytime a different story about her past.
More than seventeen families tried to raise her but some of them never took enough care of her, so she needed to sleep on the floor or be okay with only one toilet paper a day.
Helen talks endless and in third person, so not many people can follow her.
From her foster parents she was given many telephones to stay in contact.
Her only friends, Lulu, Gina and Romey live at other houses.
